title: Ticket #2633: Document IPv6 in manual
description: Put together a wiki page documenting how to use the IPv6 in 7.7.4 for brave people. This is intended for brave users/testers and will not form the final documentation, although it may be the basis for the eventualy documentation. Link it from the 7.7.4 release notes.
remarks:
2011-Nov-28 12:35:51 by adesmet:
Delayed by IPv6 being busted. Blocked by Ticket #2671: Diagnose IPv6

2012-Feb-20 13:04:45 by adesmet:
Done. https://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/wiki?p=HowToEnableIpvSix

2012-Feb-20 13:05:05 by adesmet:
New goal: integrate into the manual. Renaming ticket to match.

2012-Jun-01 09:03:24 by gthain:
Copied wiki info into manual. Not complete, but a good start.
check_ins: 2012-Jun-01 09:02   Check-in [32171]: Document ipv6 support in manual #2633 (By Greg Thain )
